SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.util

Class DataMapper

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.util.DataMapper
public class DataMapper extends Object
Utility class for mapping between data transfer objects (DTOs) and entity objects.

This class provides methods to convert between different types of DTOs and entities, as well as utilities for handling dates.

  • Method Details

    • customerDTOToCustomer

      public Customer customerDTOToCustomer(CustomerDTO customerDTO)
      Converts a CustomerDTO to a Customer entity.

      This method maps the properties of the CustomerDTO to a new Customer entity.

      Parameters:
      customerDTO - the CustomerDTO to be converted
      Returns:
      a Customer entity with the data from the DTO

    • customerToCustomerDTO

      public CustomerDTO customerToCustomerDTO(Customer customer)
      Converts a Customer entity to a CustomerDTO.

      This method maps the properties of the Customer entity to a new CustomerDTO.

      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer entity to be converted
      Returns:
      a CustomerDTO with the data from the entity

    • orderProductDTOToOrderProduct

      public OrderProduct orderProductDTOToOrderProduct(OrderProductDTO opDTO)
      Converts an OrderProductDTO to an OrderProduct entity.

      This method maps the properties of the OrderProductDTO to a new OrderProduct entity, including setting the composite primary key OrderProductId.

      Parameters:
      opDTO - the OrderProductDTO to be converted
      Returns:
      an OrderProduct entity with the data from the DTO

    • orderProductToOrderProductDTO

      public OrderProductDTO orderProductToOrderProductDTO(OrderProduct op)
      Converts an OrderProduct entity to an OrderProductDTO.

      This method maps the properties of the OrderProduct entity to a new OrderProductDTO.

      Parameters:
      op - the OrderProduct entity to be converted
      Returns:
      an OrderProductDTO with the data from the entity

    • orderDTOToOrder

      public Order orderDTOToOrder(InitialOrderDTO orderDTO, float totalPrice)
      Converts an InitialOrderDTO to an Order entity.

      This method maps the properties of the InitialOrderDTO to a new Order entity, calculates the total price with IVA, and sets the current date as the order date.

      Parameters:
      orderDTO - the InitialOrderDTO containing order details
      totalPrice - the total price of the order before tax
      Returns:
      an Order entity with the data from the DTO and calculated fields

    • orderToProcessedOrderDTO

      public ProcessedOrderDTO orderToProcessedOrderDTO(Order order)
      Converts an Order entity to a ProcessedOrderDTO.

      This method maps the properties of the Order entity to a new ProcessedOrderDTO.

      Parameters:
      order - the Order entity to be converted
      Returns:
      a ProcessedOrderDTO with the data from the entity

    • getCurrentDate

      public static Date getCurrentDate() throws ParseException
      Retrieves the current date formatted as dd/MM/yyyy.

      This utility method returns the current date in the format used for storing dates in the system.

      Returns:
      the current date as a Date object
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the date format is invalid
